thread.title: Intrepid Travel Temporarily Resigns From USTOA Membership
thread.title_full: Intrepid Travel Temporarily Resigns From USTOA Membership

title: Intrepid Travel Temporarily Resigns From USTOA Membership
text:
Intrepid Travel Temporarily Resigns From USTOA Membership July 31, 2015 
Intrepid Travel has temporarily withdrawn from the USTOA, giving up the association’s travel assistance program. Cyndi Zesk, Intrepid Travel’s North American president, said that while the company has every intention of rejoining the USTOA, the company’s de-merger with TUI has caused the temporary withdrawal from the association. Payments made before July 31 are protected under the USTOA’s travelers assistance program, but any client payments after will not be covered.
